text: Harry Catterick was an English football player and manager. He was most successful when he managed Everton F.C. during the 1960s. == Managerial statistics == Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Team From To Crewe Alexandra 1 December 1951 1 June 1953 Rochdale 1 June 1953 1 May 1958 Sheffield Wednesday 1 August 1958 April 1961 Everton 15 April 1961 12 April 1973 Preston North End 27 August 1975 1 May 1977 Total Total Total ==Honours== ===Manager=== ;Sheffield Wednesday *Football League Second Division: 1958–59 ;Everton *First Division: 1962–63, 1969–70 *FA Cup: 1965–66 *FA Charity Shield: 1963, 1970 ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1985 deaths Category:English football managers Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from County Durham Category:Everton F.C. players
title: Harry Catterick
